description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Advanced REST Client v.17.0.9 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via a crafted script to the edit details parameter of the New Project function.

Una vulnerabilidad de Cross Site Scripting (XSS) en Advanced REST Client v.17.0.9 permite a un atacante remoto ejecutar código arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través de un script manipulado para el parámetro de edición de detalles de la función New Project.
